com.mschwartz.dateslider.timeview

Class TimeTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatTextView
      • com.mschwartz.dateslider.timeview.TimeTextView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeView

    public class TimeTextView
extends AppCompatTextView
implements TimeView
    This is a simple implementation of a TimeView which is implemented as a TextView. It is aware of whether or not it is the center view in the ScrollLayout so that it can alter its appearance to indicate that it is currently selected.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected TimeObject timeObject
      The timeObject currently bound to this view
